DocAttribute.Name: MeshLength
MeshWidth
LongitudinalBarNominalDiameter
TransverseBarNominalDiameter
LongitudinalBarCrossSectionArea
TransverseBarCrossSectionArea
LongitudinalBarSpacing
TransverseBarSpacing

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcReinforcingMeshType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(PredefinedType) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcReinforcingMeshTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcReinforcingMeshTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an _IfcReinforcingMeshType_.
